resources.string:
You can put the following into your rubbish bin:
	. Plastic wraps and foil wraps
	. Disposable cups, plates and cutlery
	. Polystyrene takeaway containers and meat trays
	. Nappies and sanitary products
	. Broken glass, wrapped
	. Type 3,6,7 plastic
	. Weeds

You can put the following into your recycling bin:
	. Glass bottles and glass jars
	. Tin, steel and aluminium cans, including empty aerosols
	. Type 1,2,5 plastic
	. Pizza boxes(remove any leftover food)
	. Newspapers, magazines, advertising mail and envelopes
	. Paper, egg cartons and cardboard packaging
	. Milk and juice cartons, including Tetra Pak cartons(except on Great Barrier Island)
The following can go into your garden waste bin:\n\t\u002E Lawn clipping, shrubs, flowers\n\t\u002E Tree prunings, branches, weeds and old plants

The following can go into your compost bin:
	. Grass clippings, tree leaves, vegetable food scraps
	. Black and white newspaper, printer paper
	. Most disease free yard waste, cardboard
	. Vegetarian animal manure(e.g. cows, horses, rabbits, hamsters, etc.)
	. Wood shavings or sawdust
